name: The Segara Seaview Pool Garden & Eatery
address: Gn. Kaba, Saba, Kec. Blahbatuh, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali, Indonesia
review 1:
It is a very nice place. With 2 separate pools. The staff is very friendly and the food is also good. With a nice garden view and the sea I'm the distance. Entry tickets and food/drink prices are also low.
But in my opinion it is a place for locals with local standards..
I would easily have paid 15k to 30k more without a problem if the locker rooms/ showers were better. At least put normal doors for better privacy than those curtains that easily open due to the wind. Also separate area for women and men. And if the sitting areas where better,cleaner and more comfortable.

Ohh ya, just follow the alley to the end to get there.
review 2:
Entrance tickets on weekdays: 10k
Entrance tickets on weekends: Adult 15k, children 10k
Foods and drinks are good. Not too many choices but just right for picnic and swimming. You can bring your own food. There are 3 types of swimming pool: for babies (
review 3: The food is amazing and also the juices are! The place is beautiful with a big pool and the people are super friendly! Really nice place to go! ü§ó
review 4: The pool is great for family with kids since it's only about 1.2 meters deep. Green surroundings with sea view are something that make it interesting. However, they got very limited food and beverage options.
review 5: Nice hidden place with sea view and fair place and the food also cheap and my kids love to come here and it‚Äôs quiet near from our home .. love This place ..

name: Kutus kutus biara villa saba beach
address: Jl. Pantai Saba No.88, Saba, Kec. Blahbatuh, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80581, Indonesia
review 1:
We booked this last minute after a nightmare stay in a local villa.
This place was such a delightful find. View of the ocean from the check in area, and beautiful area around the villa. The place felt safe with overnight staff and security, and the rooms were so nice. The linen deserves a special mention - great pillows and quilts, the best I've ever experienced in Bali!
The staff were lovely and accommodating. Breakfast was included and was delivered to the villa at the requested time. We were in the area for a wedding so didn't look around too much, but the location was great, easy to find and great quality. Thanks for a great stay!
review 2:
In 2019 I booked an agent with them for my wedding party. Then Covid happened and we had of course couldn‚Äôt have it due to government regulations. I attempted to get my deposit back from them but they repeatedly declined (even though there was no mention of a ‚Äúno refund‚Äù policy)
Now fast forward and I‚Äôm trying to use this deposit to stay at their property so it‚Äôs not a complete loss. And now they say the deposit is no longer valid.

I would advise against staying at any of their properties and you can get a much better deal staying nearby at other locations
review 3: This. Is. Paradise. We LOVED this villa. The rooms were luxurious, the view and the pool and living area... perfection. Huge 5 bedroom with 3 facing the beach. Note you can't really get into the ocean water but the private little beach setup was lovely.
review 4: They don‚Äôt clean the beach at all, it‚Äôs very dirty
review 5: Happy Bali Wedding was arrange an intimate wedding ceremony Dec 2021 at this beautiful 5 bedrooms pool villa. An open living, kitchen and dining area overlooking to the garden and beach. The villa manager and team was friendly and help us set up and arrange beautiful ceremony at front of the beach. It is nice villa for wedding ceremony at your pocket budget. They have some new rooms build in Balinese cottages right next door to accommodate your friends and families. The beach sand is dark grey and not white like in Nusa Dua.

name: Villa Kishi-kishi
address: Jl. Pantai Saba No.BR, Saba, Kec. Blahbatuh, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali, Indonesia
review 1: We staid for few night at the villa.staff was amazing great service rooms are clean and spacious ,outside shower .loved the breakfast nice and clean.peaceful and quiet as it‚Äôs quite out of the way .short walk from the beach just hit the spot !thank you !
review 2:
It was pure pleasure and we felt in love with Kishi-Kishi ArtVilla üîùüòç
SPECIAL THANKS TO DEWA and other workers.
Suksuma üôè
review 3: Thank you - I have been to Bali many times before but never stayed in this area. It was the perfect stay away from the hustle and bustle, and a great location to explore some of the quieter and less touristy areas. The staff at Kishi Kishi were wonderful! The rooms were lovely. And Marcel the dog - aloof but loyal - and really such a sweetheart!
review 4:
The villa kishi kishi is a haven of peace in a green setting. There is a wonderful energy, it is a quiet place excellent for relaxing. The massages proposed on the spot are a true happiness, no need to move. Excellent breakfast and a very well equipped shared kitchen. I also tried the super good meal delivery. The cherry on the cake? Pascale is so kind and helpful. She does everything to make the stay pleasant.
Thank you very much, I recommend +++
review 5: Beautifully appointed rooms in boutique resort. Everything was beautiful and perfect. Hotel a bit far from everything but convenient for safari park and to unwind!

name: Rumah Bagus Saba
address: Saba, Blahbatuh, Gianyar Regency, Bali, Indonesia
review 1:
Had a blast at Rumah Bagus Saba in Gianyar, Bali!

The host's welcome game was on point, making our stay extra special.

The place is perfect vibes for a tropical getaway.

Highly recommend this spot for a chill and fabulous Bali experience! üëç
review 2:
I am part of the family group who were robbed overnight. We had 2 young children with us. The police have CCTV of 3 people wearing helmets and masks entering the property and going into the bedroom where my grandson was sleeping and switching off the CCTV. They spent some time searching my bedroom while I was asleep, going through several cases and bags which must have taken some time. I can't even think about what might have happened had I or my grandson woken up while they were in the room. The house is insecure and I couldn't recommend it on that basis alone as the area is quite remote, but the property is also tired and not very clean. There is no proper kitchen to prepare food or drinks and no inside living area.
The police are taking the home invasion very seriously and keeping us updated, but I am horrified that the owner thinks it is acceptable to try to blame a family group for faking the robbery just to avoid refunding us .Very worrying, so please do not choose this property and stay safe.
review 3:
WARNING Do not stay at this place they have no security and rob you whilst you sleep.
The staff must have been involved as the CCTV cameras were turned off during the robbery then back on again when they left!
The host is now refusing a refund when there is no way we could stay in the house when they robbed us.
DO NOT STAY THERE!
review 4: Stayed here for a couple days and we loved it. Beautiful location, quite, and staff is very caring about its guest. If you are looking for a group Airbnb or hotel this is the spot. If we come back to Bali this will be our go to spot üëåüèª
review 5:
Excellent service, recommended place to spend family vacation.
Good quality.

name: caSabama
address: casabama, Jl. Pantai Saba No.48, Saba, Kec. Blahbatuh, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80581, Indonesia
review 1: Absolute heaven!!!! We had the best time staying at caSabama. All three villas were spacious, beautifully designed, with plenty of space to gather together, or find quiet corners to chill out in. The attention to detail throughout the property was superb (toiletries; towels; couches; extra beds; ice in the fridge; coffee/ tea/ breakfasts each day; cars to pick up and drop guests off etc). Phoenix, Pak Wayan and the whole team were just phenomenal and offered an amazing level of service I've never experienced at a villa before. We also had them cater a big lunch for 20 people and it was incredible- stunning Balinese feast. I can't wait to come back!! Thank you to everyone at caSabama for the best birthday stay! :-)
review 2:
The photos of the villas do not do them justice ‚Äî spacious, gorgeous, well-established gardens. We booked all three villas for a 40th gathering and each has their own personality, but work perfectly for a gathering of 20 people ‚Äî you can all gather in one or there are plenty of hideaways for some quiet time.

Phoenix, Wayan and their team managing the villas went bobs and beyond organising the birthday lunch, looking after us every day. Extremely helpful whenever we needed, and I‚Äôm sure put up with a lot from us over our five days!

Every single one of the 19 people staying there have said we would go back. We were only half-joking as we went through who is 40 next in our group as we were leaving.

Thank you caSabama and the whole team!!
review 3:
An ideal home away from home in Bali. Strikingly beautiful with quirky personal touches. Attentive staff who anticipated my needs.

Been here thrice and looking forward to my next visit.
review 4:
The design of the Villa is top class, while the service is disappointing.
The receptionist was poor in English when we were trying to checkin. And there was no room number so we didn‚Äôt know who should stay in which room.
Our room service didn‚Äôt get towels replaced. What‚Äôs worse, we showered cold water for 2 days, because there was no hot water available.
review 5: Beautifullly designed, peaceful and relaxing. Staff were all top notch and lovely. Couldn't ask for more! Thanks for the special weekend Team caSabama!

name: Bharata beach house
address: Jl. Pantai Saba, Saba, Kec. Blahbatuh, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali, Indonesia
review 1: Very cool and cozy place to stay if you wanna see that back sand beach and be in a peaceful area, houses are amazing and very authentic , clean, well furnished, really enjoyed our stay, they have nice kitchen there , but take some food an advance coz supermarkets a bit far and very limited choice
review 2: Very comfy room, so spacious bedroom with full-set private kitchen. But the shower quite narrow. Very recommended stay
review 3: Had an amazing experince there üòç the place was soooo clean, enough area to park your bike/car, quite, calm and peaceful. There was a kitchen (set). Oh! And is also near the beach! How perfect! The staff and the owner were so friendly! Good service! Worth the price and highly recommended. Would definetely make a return there! ‚ù§

Best guest house in Keramas. The room has kitchen, clean, quite.
Recommended üíõ

name: Puri Angsa Saba
address: Jl. Pantai Saba, Gang Paping, Kec. Blahbatuh, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80581, Indonesia
review 1:
I stayed there with my husband for couple days. The villa is quite nice also comfy, the room is big also clean.

The owner, Bali Wayan is super nice to us. This villa is so close to the beach, so just need to walk around 5 minutes then you'll see the beach with the black sand.

Also the price is super affordable, so if you wanna stay in Gianyar, this place is recommended
review 2: Wayan and his wife are excellent hosts. Really helpful and if you need to know anything just ask üòäüíôüôè
review 3: Came here to attend my friend‚Äôs wedding near the villa and first of all, I had a very pleasant stay here although it was just 2 nights and I mostly go outside almost all day long. My husband and I were very impressed with their hospitality, especially Bli Wayan. He told us that they were just opening the villa again after they stopped operating for about 2 years. Too bad I didn‚Äôt take any picture of the villa. Their price is cheaper than other villas around there. I love the room design, it‚Äôs traditional and the huge bathroom is fabulous! I took my breakfast to the 2nd floor, the view is nice. This place is suitable for you guys that looking for a quiet and peaceful place.
review 4:
Lived in this place for 2 weeks.
To begin with, the photos of the apartments are true to reality, the rooms are quiet and comfortable, the air conditioner works at 100% and the pool is clean and large.
Always tidy and well-kept garden.
Perfect daily cleaning
The beautiful view of the ocean and the singing of the birds every morning is wonderful.
Huge gratitude to the owner.
Living in this place, you can count on 24-hour support from Wayan from the moment you arrive and throughout your stay.
He will help and give advice on any question and it is advisable to always consult with him, because he will advise only the best.
Special thanks to Wayans' wife, who every morning pleased us with a delicious breakfast and always fresh tropical fruits.
Living in this place, you will be able to enjoy your vacation 100% and actually feel at home thanks to the cozy family atmosphere.

Best wishes Denis and Valeriia
review 5: Hello, we arrive 11 in the night at Denpasar airport, think we won't be able to arrive earlier than 1. Is it possible to make a late check-in or self check-in? Thank you for your answer! BR Felix

name: Saba House / Rumah Saba
address: Saba, Blahbatuh, Gianyar Regency, Bali, Indonesia
review 1: Amazing villa! Loved our stay here. Clean, comfortable, cold AC, wifi, wonderful hosts.  The location is perfect if looking for a getaway from the touristy parts of Bali. 5 stars all the way.
review 2:
Really great place with very friendly hosts who are PROFESSIONAL Airbnb hosts. They run it like a 5-star hotel with daily maid service, a spa, massage services, and even free laundry service. The house is small, but very well laid out, so there is plenty of room for a family. It is also very close to the more traditional side of Bali with lots of sightseeing to do. The hosts are also very fair and honest as something major broke during our stay that they could have easily lied and said it cost hundred of dollars to repair. Instead, they came back with a request for a fair $50 charge.

The driver for hire is reliable and a great deal too, especially given the more remote location of this house.

If there are a few downsides to rumah saba, I would say these are the biggest issues.

1. It is right next to a small cow field, so there are tons of flies.

2. The maids have a bad habit if leaving the doors wide open while cleaning, inviting in enough flies to replace all the ones you killed the previous day.

3. Make sure to have exact cash for the massage and watch the time carefully. I believe I was charged rp75k for a rp50k massage and only had a rp100k bill, so I feel I paid double. Still a great value, but turned me off a bit.

4. A few shirts got ruined in the laundry (something with blue dye bled all over them). Plus they wash them traditionally, so they will get stretched. And it can take a few days to dry.

5. It is far from Denpasar or Kuta (30 minutes to 1 hour). So plan accordingly.

But do not let the downsides scare you Ibu Putu and her husband run an amazing Airbnb.  And the peace and quiet this place offers is a rare thing in this area. So relaxing!
review 3:
The best place for relaxation. Miss Ni luh Putu warmly welcomed us with the cold face towel and a refreshing welcoming drinks.

The price is so reasonable and the facilties a marvellouse.
review 4: fantastic place ,great hosts ,professional and friendly, daily cleaning and everything supplied. ten minutes to keramas. excellent.
review 5: Very homie atmosphere and quite roomies for big group of people
